name: User Profile Search Preferences
description: Applies saved search preferences to search queries
why: To provide personalized search experience based on user preferences
outputPrompt:
When executing search queries:

1. In search_service, if user is authenticated:
   - Fetch profile: profile = user_profile_service.get_or_create_profile(user_id)
   - Apply search_preferences:
     - Default sort order (relevance, date, quality)
     - Default filters (classification, date range, quality level)
     - Hybrid weight preference (keyword vs semantic)
2. Allow query parameters to override profile defaults
3. Store successful search patterns back to profile for learning
4. Respect privacy: make preference application opt-in
